author: mattbaird
msg: better handling of concreteclass attribute in selectclassdescriptor routine. We used to play fast n' loose, now we check for a null value and trim the concrete class value before we attempt to use it. Also cleaned up the exception handling to handle only what is necessary.

author: mattbaird
msg: strange bug where indexing by 0 caused test failure. Changed index to 1
